faqs.answer: Ans.Students aspiring to pursue MBBS have to pay INR 55,293 per annum, for MD courses fees per year is INR 10,000.

faqs.question: Is it good to pursue an MBBS from Andhra Medical College?
faqs.answer: Ans.Andhra Medical College is the oldest medical college in the entire state of Andhra Pradesh, the college has its own legacy. Students pursued MBBS from this college are very well settled in India and abroad. Moreover, the college is blessed with some very well qualified faculties which makes it a dream college for many of the aspirants.

faqs.answer: Ans.Students from open categories have to score 562 for getting into the MBBS course of the college.

Section.name: About AMC Visakhapatnam
Section.description:
Andhra Medical College, Visakhapatnam, established in 1923 is the oldest medical college in the state of Andhra Pradesh. The College is affiliated to the Dr. NTR University of Health Sciences, Vijayawada and is recognized by the Medical Council of India.
It offers a wide range of UG, PG , super speciality and diploma courses, the admission to which are completely based on the students’ rank in the NEET , NEET-PG and NEET-SS exams. Moreover, the college is attached to some of the top government teaching hospitals in Visakhapatnam, which includes colleges such as, King George Hospital (KGH) Government Chest Hospital, Government ENT, Regional Eye Hospital and Government Hospital for Mental Care, Visakhapatnam, etc.
The institute offers the MBBS course in UG, and MD, MS and Diploma courses in PG. It also offers M.Ch and DM as super specialty courses. The following table shows the details of all the courses:
Duration: 2 years Eligibility: MBBS Intake: 41 Specializations: Dermatology, Venereology & Leprosy; Anaesthesia; Child Health; Obstetrics & Gynaecology; Ophthalmology; Laryngology; Psychological Medicine; Public Health; Radio Therapy; Tuberculosis & Chest Diseases Selection criteria: NEET PG
Read More: Andhra Medical College Course Fees
Admission to all its courses are based on marks obtained in entrance examinations like NEET, NEET PG and NEET SS.
The aspiring students must submit the following documents to avail an admission into the college:
Andhra Medical College has some highly esteemed faculty members across all its 31 departments. Most of them are Doctorates. The college also invites some renowned personalities as visiting faculties. There are an adequate number of faculties including more than 9 PhD holders who have studied from top notch universities abroad.
Read More: Andhra Medical College Faculty
Passed outs of the Institution have been able to put their mark in the diverse areas including in the Academics and in the sports and other extracurricular activities like sports both within the country and abroad. Since its inception, the College has been successfully producing some of the most skilled surgeons. Some of the eminent personalities who were once part of this institute includes:
Ques. What is the fee structure of the courses?
Ans. Students aspiring to pursue MBBS have to pay INR 55,293 per annum, for MD courses fees per year is INR 10,000.
Ques. Is it good to pursue an MBBS from Andhra Medical College?
Ans. Andhra Medical College is the oldest medical college in the entire state of Andhra Pradesh, the college has its own legacy. Students pursued MBBS from this college are very well settled in India and abroad. Moreover, the college is blessed with some very well qualified faculties which makes it a dream college for many of the aspirants.
Ques. What is the cut off for getting into the MBBS course in the college?
Ans. Students from open categories have to score 562 for getting into the MBBS course of the college.
